items.description:
Featuring reversible sides windbreaker, this versatile windbreaker allows printing on both sides of the windbreaker. High quality fabric brings comfort and are good resistant under air-conditioned or cold environment. Being light-weighted, it is not too thick and humid under Singapore's sunny weather too.

Due to the colour versatility special feature, stylishness and simplicity it remains one of the top favour for Corporate and School Events order.
